languages.text: "Вам, наверное, будет интересно услышать баечку, которую мне рассказал один подвыпивший пустотник с грузовой баржи. Они вышли из варпа на полпути между Фурибундусом и системой Авиорус и нашли дрейфующий разбитый шаттл. Шаттл был приписан к "Неотвратимости торжества" — это пропавший десятилетия назад торговый корабль. Он летел на Футфол с полными трюмами ценного груза, да не долетел. Если от корабля хоть что-то осталось — это может быть ого-го какая находка!"

"This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus System and came upon a shuttle wreck adrift. The shuttle was registered to the Inevitable Triumph — a merchant ship that disappeared decades ago. She was bound for Footfall, her cargo holds brimming with valuable goods, but she never made it. If anything at all survived the shipwreck, it could be quite the lucky find!"
languages.original_text: "Вам, наверное, будет интересно услышать баечку, которую мне рассказал один подвыпивший пустотник с грузовой баржи. Они вышли из варпа на полпути между Фурибундусом и системой Авиорус и нашли дрейфующий разбитый шаттл. Шаттл был приписан к "Неотвратимости торжества" — это пропавший десятилетия назад торговый корабль. Он летел на Футфол с полными трюмами ценного груза, да не долетел. Если от корабля хоть что-то осталось — это может быть ого-го какая находка!"

traits.locale_text: "This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus system and discovered a drifting destroyed shuttle. The shuttle was assigned to the Inevitability of Triumph — a merchant ship that disappeared decades ago. She was bound for Footfall, her cargo holds brimming with valuable goods, but she never made it. If anything at all survived the shipwreck, it could be quite the lucky find!"

languages.text: “有件事情你可能会感兴趣。这件事情是某艘货运驳船上的虚空之子喝醉之后告诉我的。他们在怒焰星系与艾维罗斯星系之间离开了亚空间，遇到了一艘漂流穿梭机的残骸。那艘穿梭机登记在‘命定凯旋号’上，那艘商船早在几十年前就失踪了。船上装满了价值连城的货物，本来是要前往落脚港的，但却在途中失事了。如果你能从沉船的残骸里回收什么东西的话，那应该会是相当不错的发现！”
languages.original_text: "This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus System and came upon a shuttle wreck adrift. The shuttle was registered to the Inevitable Triumph — a merchant ship that disappeared decades ago. She was bound for Footfall, her cargo holds brimming with valuable goods, but she never made it. If anything at all survived the shipwreck, it could be quite the lucky find!"

traits.locale_text: “有件事情你可能会感兴趣。这件事情是某艘货运驳船上的虚空之子喝醉之后告诉我的。他们在怒焰星系与艾维罗斯星系之间离开了亚空间，遇到了一艘漂流穿梭机的残骸。那艘穿梭机登记在‘命定凯旋号’上，那艘商船早在几十年前就失踪了。船上装满了价值连城的货物，本来是要前往落脚港的，但却在途中失事了。如果你能从沉船的残骸里回收什么东西的话，那应该会是相当不错的发现！”

languages.text: «Quizá esto te interese: un nacido en el vacío, algo perjudicado, contó una historia sobre una plataforma de cargamento. Abandonaron la disformidad a medio camino entre Furibundus y el sistema Aviorus y se encontraron con una lanzadera a la deriva. Estaba asignada al Triunfo Inevitable, una nave mercantil que desapareció hace décadas. Su destino era Paso y el cargamento estaba lleno de productos valiosos, pero nunca llegó. Si quedara algo del naufragio, ¡sería todo un hallazgo!».
languages.original_text: "This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus System and came upon a shuttle wreck adrift. The shuttle was registered to the Inevitable Triumph — a merchant ship that disappeared decades ago. She was bound for Footfall, her cargo holds brimming with valuable goods, but she never made it. If anything at all survived the shipwreck, it could be quite the lucky find!"

traits.locale_text: «Quizá esto te interese: un nacido en el vacío, algo perjudicado, contó una historia sobre una plataforma de cargamento. Abandonaron la disformidad a medio camino entre Furibundus y el sistema Aviorus y se encontraron con una lanzadera a la deriva. Estaba asignada al Triunfo Inevitable, una nave mercantil que desapareció hace décadas. Su destino era Paso y el cargamento estaba lleno de productos valiosos, pero nunca llegó. Si quedara algo del naufragio, ¡sería todo un hallazgo!».

languages.text: 「貨物船に乗っていた酔っ払いの虚空生まれから、ちょうど面白そうな話を聞いたんだ。奴ら、フリブンダスとアビオラス星系の中間地点で歪みを抜けたところで漂流中の難破シャトルに出くわしたらしい。そのシャトルは数十年前に姿を消した商船、『イネビタビリティ・トライアンフ号』の登録船だった。当時、フットフォールに向かう途中で貴重品を大量に積んでいたけど、目的地にたどり着く前に消息を絶ったんだ。運が良ければ難破船から何か回収できるかもしれないよ！」
languages.original_text: "This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus System and came upon a shuttle wreck adrift. The shuttle was registered to the Inevitable Triumph — a merchant ship that disappeared decades ago. She was bound for Footfall, her cargo holds brimming with valuable goods, but she never made it. If anything at all survived the shipwreck, it could be quite the lucky find!"

traits.locale_text: 「貨物船に乗っていた酔っ払いの虚空生まれから、ちょうど面白そうな話を聞いたんだ。奴ら、フリブンダスとアビオラス星系の中間地点で歪みを抜けたところで漂流中の難破シャトルに出くわしたらしい。そのシャトルは数十年前に姿を消した商船、『イネビタビリティ・トライアンフ号』の登録船だった。当時、フットフォールに向かう途中で貴重品を大量に積んでいたけど、目的地にたどり着く前に消息を絶ったんだ。運が良ければ難破船から何か回収できるかもしれないよ！」

languages.text: "Das hier könnte Euch interessieren – eine Geschichte, die mir ein beschwipstes Kind der Leere von einem Frachter erzählt hat. Sie haben den Warp auf halber Strecke zwischen Furibundus und dem Aviorus-System verlassen und sind auf ein treibendes Shuttle-Wrack gestoßen. Das Shuttle war auf die Unvermeidlicher Triumph registriert – ein Handelsschiff, das vor Jahrzehnten verschwunden ist. Sein Ziel war Footfall, die Frachträume waren randvoll mit wertvollen Waren, aber es kam nie an. Falls irgendetwas die Havarie überstanden hat, könnte das ein ziemlich lohnender Fund sein!"
languages.original_text: "This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus System and came upon a shuttle wreck adrift. languages.text: « J'ai un truc qui pourrait vous intéresser... Ça m'a été raconté par un hors-monde un peu pompette, descendu d'un transport cargo. Ils avaient quitté le Warp à mi-chemin entre Furibundus et le système d'Aviorus, où ils étaient tombés sur une épave de navette en perdition enregistrée au nom de "Triomphe inexorable", un vaisseau marchand ayant disparu depuis des décennies. Il était parti pour Castel, les cales remplies d'articles de grande valeur, mais n'était jamais arrivé à bon port. Si quelque chose a réchappé à la catastrophe, ça vaudrait bien le coup de le trouver ! »
languages.original_text: "This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus System and came upon a shuttle wreck adrift. The shuttle was registered to the Inevitable Triumph — a merchant ship that disappeared decades ago. She was bound for Footfall, her cargo holds brimming with valuable goods, but she never made it. If anything at all survived the shipwreck, it could be quite the lucky find!"

Si quelque chose a réchappé à la catastrophe, ça vaudrait bien le coup de le trouver ! »

languages.text: "Belki bunu duymak ilginizi çeker. Kargo mavnasının tekinden çıkıp gelen çakırkeyif bir uçsuzdoğandan duyduğum bir hikâye. Furibundus ile Aviorus Sistemleri arasında yarı yolda öteboyuttan çıkıp başıboş bir mekik enkazına rastlamışlar. Bu mekik, onlarca yıl önce kaybolan tüccar gemisi Kaçınılmaz Zafer adına kayıtlıymış. Kargosu ağzına dek kıymetli mal dolu gemi, zamanında Binliman'a doğru yola çıkmış ama varamamış. Enkazda tek parça kalan bir şeyler varsa kârlı bir keşif olabilir!"
languages.original_text: "This one might interest you — a tale I heard from a tipsy voidborn from a cargo barge. They exited the warp halfway between Furibundus and the Aviorus System and came upon a shuttle wreck adrift. The shuttle was registered to the Inevitable Triumph — a merchant ship that disappeared decades ago. She was bound for Footfall, her cargo holds brimming with valuable goods, but she never made it. If anything at all survived the shipwreck, it could be quite the lucky find!"

traits.locale_text: "Belki bunu duymak ilginizi çeker... Bir kargo mavnasından çıkıp gelen çakırkeyif bir uçsuzdoğandan duyduğum bir hikâyeyi anlatayım. Furibundus ile Aviorus Sistemleri arasında yarı yolda öteboyuttan çıkıp başınoş bir mekik enkazına rastlamışlar. Bu mekik, onlarca yıl önce kaybolan bir ticaret gemisi olan Zaferin Kaçınılmazlığı adına kayıtlıymış. Kargosunda değerli mallar taşıyan bu gemi, aslında Binliman'a doğru yola çıkmıştı ama buraya varmadı. Eğer o enkazdan sağ kalan bir şeyler varsa, bulan çok şanslı!"
